{{DISPLAYTITLE:AFX_Scream}}This is one of the [[sound sequence]]s used for ''[[Heretic]]'''s [[ambient sound]]s. Although it is played from {{Class|HereticSoundSequence1}}, it can also be used independently.
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :AFX_Scream environment 0 slot [[HereticAmbience]]
playuntildone world/amb1 end [[Category:Sound sequences]]
